content:
**designer s notes** > if this hat is intended for a child under 2 years of age do not attach any buttons or anything that can be pulled off and choked on **materials**
  • cup " paper" 1 skein acrylic worsted gold color
  • frosting 1 skein acrylic worsted pale pink color
  • cherry approx 2 yards bulky weight acrylic red color
  • 1 set us size #7/4 5mm double pointed needles or size obtain gauge
  • large-eyed blunt needle
  • stitch markers
  • optional buttons scrap yarn beads safety pins
skill level

easy
